comments: Super nice and a great teacher, fuelled my passion and love for classics! If you have him for a prof definitely go see him for help or just to talk to!

He was awful. Seems like a nice enough person but his pretentious British accent and his tendency to use words that over complicate a simple concept was extremely irritating. I enjoy history courses but he made it difficult for me to go to class due to me essentially having to sit through the reading of an essay. He was not at all charismatic.

Coming to lecture was a chore; very boring. The content was only saved by my amazing TA; without her I would've hated the class and done very badly. Corner talks a lot and doesn't care much for the opinion of others at all or trying to be helpful. Unapproachable professor but the class is an easy pass.

INCREDIBLY boring. Made an interesting subject tedious and really hard. He speaks like he's in constant poetry and he's hard to understand. All around he could be alright, but the class was too tough for his teaching style.
AMAZING! super passionate about classics and just an overall amazing speaker, best lectures ever
AMAZING! the best lectures I have ever been to, he is very passionate and just an amazing speaker
The lectures were super boring. In the lectures  you will notice he says one sentence and repeats three times saying the same thing in different words.

So, I thought this class would be really great, turns out, the prof was the absolute worst. I couldn't follow a thing he said, the power points were so hard to follow. He is a complete ass, and pretentious beyond belief. I really don't understand why anyone would enjoy his lecture. They were possibly the worst I've ever sat through.

High Level Thinking translates to ridiculous comparisons with modernity. Most class time was spent  explaining what was said in the first ten minutes. Notable classes included thirty minute exposes of how a plastic chair embodied the theories of physical reality. Thinking this high needs more than books

The material is challenging, the reading list laborious, the midterms and exam difficult, but the enjoyment I drew from the work was equally great. Corner is a fantastic orator, eloquent and emphatic, missing lecture is only depriving yourself; his feedback on work is detailed and extensive; very willing to discuss. High expectations are the norm.
Interesting lecture content. Very knowledgeable prof. The course was easy if you did majority of the work.

Nice guy, but really high level thinker. Not easy to follow and the classes were really tedious. The Exam was alright, but the whole class became confusing and I dreaded the tutorials. I never want to hear the word "Tiberius" ever again

The most energetic professor I had in my first year. He does not spoon feed his students and sets very high standards (as he should, seeing as it is university). Though he speaks quite fast, his lectures are very clear. If you are truly passionate about classics or history, this is a professor you must go for. Don't underestimate him, however.

Dr. Corner is a wonderful man, a uniquely gifted mind and in possession of a deep kindness. Though his expectations are very high, as they should be (and you must expect to work diligently), his understanding and willingness to work with students would seem to be boundless, do make use of his office hours for he is an eminently personable man.

He was impossible to listen to. High level thinker, not a lecturer. He was complex in his wording and hard to follow. I'll end up failing this course because my notes were so all over the place at his random speech and otherwise
Lectures were unbearable. He basically read an essay. Very boring. Way to much information that we were never tested on. Fortunately, I had a great TA, but I would have dropped the course otherwise.

Horrible prof! Was so excited for this class and instead was bored to death by his lectures. Slides were super unclear and often gave up on keeping up with notes and instead played minesweeper. Also I don't think it is natural to sweat that much.
Professor is very monotonous, very boring, extremely slow. Does not engage well with the material, is not a very good orator. Tutorials in this class are a life saver.

dr corners lectures are soooooooooo boring, and i mean boring!!!! i don't think anyone in my class found his lectures to be clear or easy to follow. he seems like a nice man, but really boring teacher.

Corner is awesome, he's funny, passionate and helpful. There was only ONE class where I had a hard time following him because he was going quickly. He was always willing to help me or just chat. I always take his classes when I can.
Dr. Corner is amazing! One of the best! Clear, but in depth lectures. Helpful and sharply dressed!  Always approachable and incredibly nice! Take anything he teaches! Thank-you for a great term.
Brilliant professor. Extremely easy to understand, knows everything about the topic being taught. Entertaining, friendly, one of the best history/classics professors at McMaster.

This course was fantastic!!! It truly is his world. His lectures were clear, and the slides were helpful. At times we would be behind, causing confusion, but because the lectures were soo in depth. There were alot of text books for the course. In short, take anything offered by him, he is truly talented, and one of the best in the department. :O)
Professor Corner is truly a unique talent, and a natural one as well. A natural pedagogue (meant in the positive sense) if ever there was one.

Yet, again, another fabulous term with Dr. C! Although, he tends to be biased with authors, he explains why. Beware, seminars become lectures, expect a 10% drop in grade, because he, himself is a tough marker. Expects ALOT from his students in seminar. But is always eager to help with anything. THANK-YOU DR. CORNER! ;O)

Another great course with Professor Corner. This guy is the reason I changed to Classics. His class this year was a little harder. The final exam could have had a little more choice. Lectures were fascinating as usual. Beware though, the TAs in Classics at MAC are horrid markers. Make sure to get your tests/essays remarked by the Dr. Corner.
Simply brilliant.  HE deals with very profound and complex concepts, yet, he explains them with ease.  Slides are useful, texts are interesting, and lectures are organized SO well.

Dr.Corner was fantastic! He has high expectations but if you have problems or concerns he addresses them. He was always willing to help and explain things so clear. This is my 3rd class with him and I never get bored, though sometimes it is hard to focus in lecture because they sound exactly like a textbook. Shine on! Nice shirts, awesome accent!
useless, not a leader, not helpful, no clean instructions on assignments. pretentious poser in  a paisley shirt.
No Comments

Dr. Corner is AMAZING. He is a fantastic lecturer, his shirts are awesome,everything that comes out of his mouth is soo eloquent and coherent. One of the gems of the classics department. After having him again I realize how really brilliant he is. Take everything and anything he teaches. He is one of the many reasons why I am in Classics. ROCK ON!
Dr. Corner is an amazing professor. His lectures are fantastic and it sounds like he practices for hours.
The best prof MAC has to offer. Very approachable, excellent lecturer. Not only is he a nice guy, he is easy on the eyes.

Dr. Corner is by far the finest professor that I have. His lectures are phenomenal, he is very knowledgeable, and listening to him speak is like candy for your ears. If I wasn't enrolled in this class, I would still come to his lectures because they really are amazing. He is not afraid to answer questions either. He also has a nice wardrobe.
Dr. Corner is awesome. He is an amazing lecturer and a very nice, helpful person. His fantastic paisley shirts keep things colourful.
Leads fascinating lectures. It's like watching an addictive history documentary! Imagine!
Interesting course but a lot of reading...great prof!

Dr. Corner is an amazing professor! He is so clear and has a true passion for what he does. His voice a bonus! His shirts keep you awake when you look at them! One of the best professors in the Classics department at Mac! I hope I have him for many more classes! :)
Excellent prof, very passionate. And the accent...the man could read the classifieds and make them sound sexy.

Great prof! He's brilliant and brings a lot of knowledge to the lecture, which can sometimes be overwhelming. But he's always open to questions, too. He's friendly and approachable, and also really hot.

Far and away the most knowledgeable, most friendly, most helpful and most charismatic professor I have had. He inspired me to further studies in ancient history and remains a friend. Lectures so clear and dramatic I still have 3 saved on my PC. Awesome.
Awesome prof. It's all about the shirts!!  Cheers!

Well what can I say, the man is brilliant and is passionate about his work.  He was very helpful in this class, and gives very good feedback on your work.  He raises interesting questions and brings up interesting topics for discussion..Take note of the paisley shirts!
oh.. corner... what will we say about you?

He is very smart but he jumps all over the place in his lectures. It is hard to pay attention throughout the whole class because there is just TOO much information.....at least 4 pages of notes every class....plus copying down the overhead.

This dude is smart. He really knows his stuff and he has a ton of passion for his topic. Door is always open if you have a question. Teaching methods need some refining. His lectures are VERY complex but he pushes you to think beyond conventional methods. In that sense, his teaching is very innovative. You will either hate or love his classes.
watch him while u talk!

he was a brand new professor last year, so of course it was going to be difficult for him in the beginning.  I tried hard to follow him, but had a hard time understanding where he was going with certain points.  It is clear that he has a real passion for Classics, so that was admirable but I do hope he gets a better teaching methods.

Expected way too much for the midterm. Jumped around alot and until he started using overheads, it was really hard to understand him. He made me lose interest in ancient history - horrible prof. But, he is new, so maybe he'll be better as he gets more expirence.
He's an amazing lecturer...I learned so much from him!  All of you who don't understand his lectures, must not go to class.  For a professor who hasn't finished his phd...he's doing great!!
One of the worst Profs I have ever had.  he made me totally lose interest in ancient history.  He truely sucks!
Classes are a form of narative and his smooth sultry voice can keep a girl intrigued...

Sometimes different to understand his dialect, but brilliant.  He is knowledgeable and puts a big emphasis on why ancient history matters and how it can be applied to our present day.  -n Very interesting prof - To some he seems to be all over the place, but I was able to follow him perfectly fine.
No Comments

This guy is smart, and knows his****. This means that he can effectively destroy those of us who don't do our readings with one "hulk smash". Take philosophy before taking his class; you'll need it to understand him. Also, I like the pink shirt. He can pull it off and it is definitely his colour.

I found Dr. Corner to be unclear for half of the term. He's helpful though. The assignments weren't bad, either. I ended up doing pretty ok in the class, so I'm not going to complain. Dr Corner: Shine on, you crazy diamond!

awesome, be sure to stay awake cuz if u take good notes from his lectures, they're great to study for the exam.  especially when he got to the greek stuff, he was on fire.  i think the course needs its own website tho, for outlines and posting lecture notes/material.
No Comments

Dr. Corner is a wonderful professor.  This man is brilliant, he defenitly knows his****.  The lectures were sometimes a little dull, but hey, thats the material, not him.  He was always enthusiastic and extremely helpful whenever I asked him for assistance.  Plus, he is freakin' HOT!!

To all of those above who commented about finding his lecture materials too hard-if you think that's too hard, you're a brainless moron not fit for university. His lectures are unique, engaging and enthusiastic, always fun to attend. He's open for suggestions and always available to help. A winner!

One of the best professors I've had thus far. He's extremely approachable and a genuinely nice person. The class is fabulous and as long as you do your preparations, you should do fine. The shirts are a little sketchy, but all in all, Dr. Corner is great.

I have to say i like the shirts, and now that he's started with the overheads lectures are really good.  This is his first year so i'm not surprised that he had a problem or too but he DEFINITELY knows what he's talking about...and being hot with a majorly hot accent helps
Crap

The worst class I have ever attended in my life!  I can't believe I'm paying to be lulled to sleep by this moron.  His lectures are dull and hard to follow.  the material provided for the essay is hard to read, and the stupid website that had our assignment on never works properly.
i find the class pretty interesting most times when i go. Im just sorry i missed the 'randy' lecture
For the first part of the term, I could never follow what he was saying at all. He even apologized to our class for being unclear.
His shirts are more interesting than his lectures. His pwr to teach a class is extremely poor and unpwrful. May Inana infuse him with the pwr he needs, cause Inana only knows he does need it.
Professor Corner is hot as a D
Corner is a beautiful boy

By far the worst professor I have ever had.  His lectures are dull, and he never highlights what is important.  His lectures seem to jump around alot & they don't follow any definable pattern.  His lectures don't give me anything I can't get from a textbook.  A lecture should clarify information.

Dr Corner is amazing. Not only are his shirts fantastic, but he is extremely approachable & more than willing to answer questions. He uses suggestions & lectures are interesting & easy to follow if you pay attention & do the readings.
I think that he jumps around a lot and he confuses me. However, if people have problems he seems to answer them on the spot.

Corner is a difficult teacher to follow, and his lectures aren't particualrly fascinating, however his suave english charm and shirts that are reminiscient of a kaleidoscope earn him huge points in my books. Sean likes yorkshire pudding, snooker, and can

What the hell is everyone else thinking! Corner's the worst professor I ve ever had. I took his class cause I loved 1LL3 but I and the entire class can't follow let alone understand his lectures! I cant believe I am paying to put myself through his class!

I love this class, and Corner makes it just THAT much  better. His lectures are always interesting and informative, and he has a sense of humour and is approachable. The perfect combination. I hope to have him throughout my undergraduate career.

This is professor Corner's frst year teaching at Mac, and he has done an awesome job. He seeks out students input, and actaully takes and uses suggestions. A really great prof, he makes the class really enjoyable!

comments: He is a very good researcher but a terrible prof. He tends to assign mandatory bio-stats online assignments with so many bugs that it is impossible to finish. He also doesn't make any exceptions for extraneous circumstances. However, if you study the powerpoints he posts you will get a 10 fairly easily.

The entire organization of the course was a complete disaster. We covered 16 chapters, one of which could have had a whole exam written for it. His notes were not in depth at all, so the textbook was a must. His lectures were boring and the tests were brutal or awkwardly worded at best to make you lose marks. Avoid him if you can.

Had him as a thesis Supervisor. He has a weak background in many of the new projects he undertakes and had no capable Post Docs while I was there.  He was unable to provide intellectual support to his students.  Having now established myself in the research community, I would say Mr. Schellhorn's research and teaching skills are poor.

I am enjoying the class a lot more than I thought I would.  Dr. Schellhorn definately has hard tests, but he encourages thought rather than just memorization.  Definately a fair marker, he tries to give out marks whenever possible even if the answer is not consistent with what he taught in class.
The lectures were a little dry, but he went really in depth, and made it clear what he was testing on.
No Comments

He was my least favourite of the 3 first-year profs. I didn't like his "lecture notes" which turned out to be overheads and I definitely learned more about Vitamin C than anything else I was supposed to learn from what he taught. At least he tried to get us to answer questions like half the time!
I think I'm now an expert in vitamin c. He is a smart guy, but goes off topic a lot to his research.
I think he's cute, he tries to make jokes and it's really nice! He can be interesting, and tells you whats on the test!
Nice guy, really smart, kinda boring.  Reminds me of one of my teachers from back in high school.
I think I managed to stay awake for one lecture...  He should give free coffee away before he starts speaking!
Boring. At least he has Sulaman.
nice guy.  very helpful, but boring lectures!
Made Biology soooooo boring...nice guy, but he's like a zombie!
hard to stay awake
Good looking for an old guy...but...sigh...boring as hell! If i hear one more phrase with "E.coli" in it I swear I'm gonna scream!!!
I hope he is a good rescearcher because he should not get paid for his teaching.
Your time is up!  ARe u even awake during your own lecture?? i know biology can be a lot more interesting than this guy makes it! prepare to sleep in his class..
No Comments
Can't keep eyes open...
watching paint dry was more interesting, but i caught up on my sleep
No Comments
get a new act!
Creates a good sleeping enviornment...
zzzzzzz...
No Comments
No Comments
A little on the dry side but he was trying!!!
My textbook on paper was more interesting than watching Power Point of the text
No Comments

sometimes a little boring, but like how he doesn't just teach from text

comments: Soooo old. Soooo funny. But boring as hell. It's hard to stay awake, hard to attend class. Sitting at the front helps/he will answer qu's in class but alot of ppl ask dumb qu's. All lectures avail online which is great and so helpful if you fall behind. KEEP UP & dont leave it last minute- tests are hard!!!
awesome times
boring, monotone, indifferent towards students
HARD COURSE
Lectures may be a bit boring, but they're still jokes! Wesolowsky's the man, and his broadcast lectures are a real help. Always try to show up, if for no other reason than to listen to the jokes.
Great prof, and funny. material is hard if you dont keep up with lectures/practise tests.
really nice guy, good lecture notes and always willing to help.
cool prof, helpful and gives fair tests
No Comments

Wicked guy, cracks jokes all the time. He gives you practice tests sdince 97 lol.. He has online lectures and tells you not to even buy the book. Love this guy. He is very evasive it seems if you go in to talk to him but he cracks wicked beer jokes sometimes haha. I think he might have wanted to be a lawyer with the number of lawyer jokes he cracks

Great prof. Knows the material is boring, but tries to make the class more exciting. Cracks some jokes, overall a great guy. Don't need the textbook, and he tells you so right away. Material can get confusing, but he seems to be helpful as well. Big ups, sir.
Half of you won't come to class or need a text book- done!
Corny jokes. Boring class, but its easy. Do the practice tests and the homework problems, you'll do fine.
seems like a nice guy! very funny! but tests are hard. it would be nice if his notes we understandable and if he taught the same way as the text book.
Boring as hell, too monotone. Jokes suck, knowing that he uses that exact same dry jokes for each section. Probably rehearses the jokes in the mirror before comming to class!
love his sense of humour (it's needed to get through an hour of stats).  given the subject, he teaches it quite well and thorough.  Well done, sir.
very funny
Class is easy if you do the work, I loved his dry humour, funny man.
classes are boring, but he's funny (unique sense of humor)
He is such a Grandpa, so cute.  His jokes may be corny but still funny.
he always makes some stupid jokes
good prof, makes me laugh!
Don't be fooled by the last two... this is no easy course.
He's cute!!
Great Prof. !!!

comments: He is such a great professor, he has helped me many times.  I once went to his office during his office hours for help and he went above and beyond.  I was broken up with my girlfriend for over three months and I haven't had any liquid relief for a while.  When I went to this professor, he helped me with my assignment and also hand relief.

Professor Kovarik is the greatest prof.  He puts his time, mind and soul into teaching and really cares about his students.  He made Mathematics fun for me and I am greatly thankful to him forever and always.

Dr. Kovarik is a decent teacher with a very calm and kind demeanor. His tests were fair (not too easy or hard). Was not perfectly clear when teaching some concepts, but with supplemental textbook reading, class notes were useful.

Though a tad bit difficult to follow at times, he is a great prof, and what makes him great is his willingness to help the students. A lot of professors don't care about the questions their students ask, but he really is willing to answer any question. I thought his tests are very fair, and people only complain because they don't wanna do the work.

He is the easiest math professor in the history of this university. He has no consideration for academic integrity and makes very easy quizzes. He is throwing free credit for the math 3g3 course. He is also an incredibly easy marker. Shame on him for being so easy. He is really ruining what a math degree has to offer students- brainstorming skills
Very poor teaching skills. Talks to himself. Low attendance in his lectures. Avoid this prof. People don't like him.
He needs to go easier on students. For an old person one would think he would care for his students like he cares for his grandchildren, but that is not the case at all.
He is a really tough professor. The quizzes were so tough.
What a great professor. He is so great in teaching. He explained concepts upside down and inside out. He actually made you understand it, his teaching style was marvellous.
He's cute. It looks like he works out a lot.
Very tough prof. U have to be genius to pass his course.
Absolutely the worst professor ever. His teaching is very bad and his exams are unfair. Terrible experience overall.
terrible teaching. Very unclear during lectures and writes really challenging tests. Not fair!!!

He is the worst PROF EVER!! If he does not want to help a student, he will not answer your email even. He is so rude that he even ignores people's emails sometimes. He needs to have the courtesy that if someone emailed him, atleast he should answer back. His teaching is unclear and his tests and exams are very very hard. Good luck if you have him.
I agree. He is one of the best profs around.
Oh, I learned so much from this prof. He was very inspirational. I understood every word he said during lecture. Yeah, sure.
Great prof! Went to every lecture and enjoyed all of them FOR SURE!! And he tells the best jokes. Ha Ha.
He puts unfair questions on his tests. Needs to be a little more clear with students.
Toughest prof I've ever had
He writes unreasonably hard tests. NEeds to take it easy on students.
Good prof
He should be a male model! He is clearly superior to his competition! Such a handsome prof!!
Excellent at teaching. Really knows how to get the concepts across to students. Very smart and Intelligent prof
He is one of the best instructors around
He is the best prof of MCMASTER University.
AMAZING PROFESSOR. HE IS VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE.
He is great. This course was very hard but I got A in his class. Math 3G03 is one of the toughest courses ever.
He is the best professor I have seen in first year engineering. His explainations are very good and his teaching style is remarkable.

This horrible prof should be fired from MCMaster. He is so unfair. His teaching style is "Talk to the blackboard", he has major Issues!!! There are rumours circulating he is teaching Math 3C03 next year, save yourself the Agony, DONOT register in any of his courses. Taking his courses will be your biggest nightmare.
The multiple choice questions that he asks are ****ed up
I enjoyed his class thoroughly. Great guy, sweet sense of humour. Genius when it comes to multiple choice tests. Had to remind him when our tests were, but overall his "recipes" made calculus easy!
Useless teaching, Hard tests, Overall bad prof.
Very tough course
worst prof ever, seriously stay away from him and any course he teaches!!!
Best professor I have ever had. He is very nice when u see him during office hour and he is welcoming and helpful.
Bad prof. poor testing. His multiple choice are tough. Avoid this professor otherwise you will regret it. He does not give good marks!

I knew after the first lecture I would never attend his lectures again. I've had him 3 times, and I think the reason I did well is because I didn't attend. Besides, who walks around campus in a safari hat and suspenders ?
Goes too fast, and his lectures leave you confused
Oi. What are you talking about, Kovarik? Get a little organized.

In all seriousness, this guy is the worst prof. His tests are ridiculously hard, 1 multiple choice worth 5 marks, he often puts questions that weren't covered in detail in class. His evaluation style is weird. He seems like a nice guy, but his teaching is unclear, and his tests are kind of stupid. He does maintain a good diary of events on the web.
He is a beautiful man.
Knows the material very well, difficult course, but you can get a lot out of the material he teaches
No Comments
An awful professor who likes to fail his students. His tests are unfair and ridiculous. His sample tests are different from the actual tests. Mean guy!!
I love the way he say "PAADON"....for "Pardon" it sounds like "Paadan" beautiful voice but the test questions are nasty.
It's impossible to get anything out of his lectures. He's all over the place keeping you confused. Then people get incredibly low marks on tests.

Bad teaching, his handwriting is not good, no interaction with the class, lectures all over the blackboard leaving you confused as to what's going on, and very hard tests. Test questions different from homework problems, MUCH TOUGHER IN FACT
Easy tests, hard final exam!
Very well organized website. Tests are fair if you actually did the homework and knew your stuff.
This prof skips steps, talks to the board as well as expects you to already know all the material before teaching! He seems to be very condescending. But he DOES seem to love the subject?
Nice guy, knows a lot, but can't teach.  Seems to like the most complicated way of explanation.  It should be pretty telling that every class I've had him for, the average was fairly low.
EXCELLLENT PROFESSOR
Boring and the tests are tough. Maybe just the course is tough.
Hard to understand, boring, and MAN are his answer notes (more like brief summarys) condesending
Not bad. The midterms were fair. Hope the final will not be too difficult.
He was great. His tests and quizzes were totally fair. If you did the homework carefully you would have no problem in them.
He is the most angel prof I have ever met. I am so glad I took his course. He is polite, reasonable, and writes fair tests. He's the man.
A great professor no doubt, but more than that an exceptional sweet human being. The multiple choice on his tests are a little tough though.
Greatest teacher I have ever had
He's a very nice guy!!!
He is kind, caring professor, has big heart. Gave us good sample final exam. TA Jason Haradyn very helpful and always eager to provide extra help. One of the best teachers ever had

He's probably different in the summer... but during the year.... let's just say the class started off with over 200 people, and by the end, i'm not even sure there were even 2 people left. But i feel sorry for him cause he really does try, and he kinda cute - he looks like santa claus.. lol! And his jokes are pretty dumb, which makes them funny.
AWESOME
Cutest professor ever. Fair tests, HARD exam. If you don't go to class, you'll find his final very hard. Especially the multiple choice questions on his exams are tough.
Very dedicated prof. Knows his stuff upside down.

Hard to understand...I took the course in the summer, and I found his teaching style reflected an "upgrade course" style. Flew through the material rather quickly as well because he mostly did examples...I found myself having to go back and teach myself. He does care however, and makes every effort to have fair tests.
Awesome!
Very cute professor and cares about his students

Dr. Kovarik is the most helpful and one of the most intelligent math professors at mcmaster university. He teaches a wide variety of courses at various levels and knows his stuff upside down in everything. His final exams are a bit tough
Great teacher. Explains concepts very clearly
Excellent prof
No Comments
couldn't understand anything he said

KOvaric was my first year algebra prof and oh my godddd! he was boring like hell.  But he did try his best and tried to be a good teacher.  Easy tests and exam. Sometimes you can see him on the HSR bus, he gets off near downtown.
Great prof
Ver nice guy - genuine care for students. Good job.
Holy crap!! I don't know what's going on!!
Good prof.Thick accent, funny jokes... cause they're stupid. Yup i see him on the HSR too.
Funny jokes, even funnier when 99% of his class dont get them. Covers good examples and hes a good teacher overall, might have some problems understanding his writing at times.
i dont know what the hell is going on in during the class
Seems like a nice man, but hard to understand and keep awake
So boring I actually went to an 8:30 lecture to avoid him!
No Comments
bad writing, can barely understand him .. easy to sleep to his voice
santa claus lookalike and always on HSR!
no prob with him, hard to understand....fell asleep from him
i think he is santa claus in his spare time
He goes sooooo fast, but he's really nice and shells out alot of jokes
He is a really nice person but he teaches a hardest course.
hes so cute but you cant understand him or his notes
He's not hard, I just can't understand him
Seriously, what the hell does this guy teach?

comments: Absolutely ridiculous teacher. Cannot teach at all yet was put in charge of this course. Gives test where there are formulas required (and attached on a formula sheet) then doesn't base any questions on the formulas. Bases tests on only the difficult parts of material. First test I had the first half of the material learned was not even there. BAD

Tests too long for the time allotted. Felt like I was going to fail, and had a failing grade until the exam and then ended up with a C+. My last theoretical math course of my university career. Thank God its over. Phewww.

Absolutely terrible professor. Mumbles into the board, has terrible handwriting. Doesn't care about his students at all, doesn't answer questions. Tests are super hard. Honestly shouldn't teach at all, absolutely no drive to actually help students understand anything.

Abysmal explanation of course material. He took his time writing definitions, derivations, and proofs on the board but rushed through examples with his back to the class. Tests were extreme versions of the rushed examples. He didn't understand why we wanted him to slow down. Find another resource. He did give alternate marking schemes to help us.

Absolutely brutal. Teaches the board directly from the textbook. Will look at the class at most once per lecture. No remorse for having a 45% average on both midterms, doesn't care for his students. No passion, no compassion, heartless.
I don't know how he's a professor honestly. He reads and writes directly from textbook. Useless , khanacademy and textbook are your bestfriends in his class.
Not willing to help, rude attitude during  office hours. Tutorial given by TA is more helpful than his lectures.

I stopped attending Gabardo's class after about the third week, and started attending a different professors class instead. Gabardo reads theorys, proofs and examples (in that order) directly from the textbook, without explaining the concepts or general knowledge behind each of them.I found I learned more by spending the same time reading on my own

Great professor. Helpful in office hours, and in lecture. His tests are difficult but if you do your  assignments, study your lecture notes and read the textbook, there is nothing really surprising and you should do fine.
useless, no help, not suitable to teach, no problems with math until i had him as a professor
"Let's make the test fair and manageable in the time given to the students" Said no Gabardo. ever.
The textbook is your best friend for this class

Useless prof. Had to learn the entire course on my own from the textbook. Lectures were useless so don't bother going. Tests are horribly unfair and often contain questions never seen in lecture or in the textbook or on the assignments. Exam was absolutely insane. Destroyed everyone. No chance at all. Still passed the course but very frustrating.

Tests are a poor reflection of what you know in the course. More of a test on how well you can manage time. Don't waste any with questions that don't work out. > 60% of the people will not have enough time to finish all questions on both term tests. Due to teaching style - This is a textbook course, you have been warned

His test is extrmely hard compare to his examples. His lecture is not bad, but he's really helpful in his office hour. His explaination is not bad needs to solve several questions to understand correctly. I usually attended to lecture excpet two or three. He needs to use more textbook. correction
Insanely hard tests ...

very annoying mumbler, bad handwriting, unprepared, struggles and fails on own examples, tries to solve things in his head, makes many mistakes and needs correcting all the time. gets puzzled look when asked question, cannot answer anything. tests did not relate to covered material or test samples. had to adjust grades each time (40% on summer!)
His tests were ridiculously unreasonable.
the worst prof I've ever had in my life
Awful, just awful.

Useless lectures and slides. horrible tests. unreasonable assignments since there is no one did by himself. unfair in curving the midterm marks. at the end try to avoid him. he makes life difficult and worst department I have ever seen

He made all of his tests and exams impossibly hard. He had to bell curve each test at least 15% in order for enough people to pass the course. The material in the textbook was doable, his tests were not.

I will admit his tests are impossible to do, and his lectures are pretty much useless. But he is willing to help if you go to his office hours. At least he's fair in the exam marking and bell curving the marks.
WORST PROF I EVER HAD. HE IS EXTREMELY UNFAIR

Horrible professor. Is extremely unapproachable and when attending office hours, he is rude. He doesnt talk to students while lecturing, since he talks tot he chalkboard. Really hard tests and people were just flipping pages durring the exam. Unreasonable in every way.

I thought this prof was very fair, and understanding. Even though his lectures were really boring, the weekly assignments weren't too bad, and the tests were very fair. His sample tests really helped to prepare.

LETHAL PROF. Extremely hard. But very very helpful in his office hours. His tests and finals make sure the electrical and eng phys enigneers know inside out what the content is. fail rate quite high for a math course. Nice guy though. makes sure mcmaster has good quality engineers graduating.

On both midterms he made the test out of 40 instead of 50 when the class average was poor (50ish), and made the exam worth 80% instead of 60% to help those who didn't do as well on the tests (me). I went into the exam with a 64, but aced it and finished with above 90. He is a bit detached and dry in class, but is willing to help.
very unhelpful...unclear in lectures..after a week..only 20 ppl went to his class...rude if u ask for help...

Awful, couldn't teach me how to tie my shoe laces even though I already know how.  Think I am joking, he lecturing us about conservation of energy a topic we learned in physics class a few weeks earlier and I didn't understand a thing he was saying.  I got an 11 in that physics class.
Easy class, he's okay nothing special though, just your typical prof who you probably won't remember.
he's not a human being and not in a good way like Einstein or Michael Jordan.  He has no humanity.
Nedds to learn to write a one hour test that you can actually FINISH in one hour, not 5!)
Positives: Doesn't actually eat his students.
Very knowledgable and helpful if you ask. His accent is fine... It can be a bit boring, but it is just the material...
professor gabardo needs to engage the class and actually pretend to care about teaching the subject to all students. even if he despises the incompetent ones.
His notes are good, but he won't keep your attention long.  Write it down, learn it later was my motto for getting through his course.
His accent may be hard to understand (for those who didn't have french in school). His grammar is fine though, and he understands you fine.
take a pillow to class
bad accent, tries to speak english but no speak it well, and hes a prof! Terrible

Mumbles in class sometimes and can be uninteresting.  Clearly knows the material though and if you see him outside of class he is very willing to help.  Held an extra last-minute study session for us that was *very* useful.
Dr. Gabardo is an okay professor. He is quite boring and somewhat unclear but his tests are rather easy.
No Comments
Bad!
No Comments
Reading the textbook is much better than taking notes
This is my self-study course.
This guy is as smart as his best friend "Cauchy", he could have as well taught the course in french..dare you not to sleep..
Knows his material inside out and is one of my best. Not at all for lamers who sit and make noise and fail the course at the year end.
bad accent, easy tests, hard midterm, get passing grade and ride the bell curve
easy prof
No Comments
good notes, tests were easy, exam difficult but came away with a 12=P happy girl
No Comments
into the exam with a 55, ended up with a b+, i'm happy
He's an awesome teacher!
hard teacher, thick french accent, pretty boring
Tests don't reflect course material. Lectures are straight from the textbook.
Summer school for the goose
Accent... and he noticed a HUGE error on his notes he's been using for years
Never attended classes because writing his notes just didn't help me.
No Comments
I've never wrote faster notes in my life
nice guy hard test!
No Comments
Set test in a way that is not in anyway similar to assignments or practise tests
he made the test too hard~
No Comments
his accent bugs me
unclear
heavy accent, crazy tests
Goes too fast, worst teacher in the school.

comments: Do not take this class if you plan on doing well in university. How he marks test is f*&ken retarded paired with useless TAs. Avoid at all costs.
Class material quite challenging but he clearly is passionate about concepts and explains them in very interesting manner

ugh..hard class.. I was really looking forward to taking it! dreaded taking it! midterms and the final are brutal! TA's are no help..and mark the sa part of the tests extremley difficult..be prepard for like 1.5's out of a 6 on the sa ?'s. You have to know approx 21 articles extensively inside and out..don't let it fool you. very hard course overal
He was very knowledgeable and made the subject somewhat interesting.  Testing was challenging, but no textbook was required, only scientific articles, so that was a huge money saver.
Amazing prof, made a really complicated course fun and manageable.
A great prof, and class was so intresting! But the things he talks about can be explained a bit easier
Course material can be difficult but Dr. Daly does a great job of giving practical examples (over and over...).

Awesome prof; one of the most interesting at mac. Some of his questions are tough b/c the material has subtleties that are hard to understand, and that is also why he gives so many examples.  Really nice guy outside of class as well.
really funny.. clear material... tests are very challenging...
Articulate man.  He will challenge you to understand human evolution and the English language.  The course is extremely interesting, the man knows his stuff!
Way too difficult, pretentious, outrageous. Don't take this course if you want to graduate on the dean's list!!! blech
Course material is very interesting, but sometimes the language used goes WAY over my head... break it down to simple every-day words Dr. Daly!!!

Dr. Daly is so intelligent its daunting. Hilarious man. Stay on top of course work. Talk to him-it helps your marks. Course is tough-be prepared for craziest multiple choice you've ever experienced-more confusing than Dr.Day! Take his course-worth it!
Good prof.  HILARIOUS!!! (though I seemed to be the only one getting his jokes..) and extremely passionate about and dedicated to his interesting research.
not good with students..very intelligent, but not personable or understandable...
He is so intelligent and challenges students to really understand the material. Great prof!
No Comments
No Comments
He's very challenging but brilliant. He seems to know more than most profs. I really enjoyed this class and would recommend it to anyone.
One of the best prof's at Mac, one class with Dr. Daly and you're hooked on evolutionary psychology
one of the few profs who remembers that there's more to being a university student than acing a multiple choice exam.  he expects your best--more profs should.
Why on earth are you making it harder than it needs to be?  And why be obsessed with grammar in a psych course??

comments: Arthur was an excellent Prof. He explained difficult logical concepts well and fairly evaluated his work. I have heard that he is not as good in other courses.
Excessive reading, unclear explanations, had no time for first year students. If his Philos1E03 class was the first philosophy class I took I would never take another.

He has that 'I don't care' attitude, his lectures lack any sort of passion for the subject matter (which makes them boring), and he makes it very clear that he doesn't care about the welfare of his students. I most definitely will not be taking any other courses taught by him again.

Lectures were long and tiring. Overall Lectures were not helpful at all and did not make any sense. The readings were insanely long and strenuous. Tutorials helped a little but not by much. Overall I learned the course ware by myself through the textbook despite still going to lectures.
terrible. awful experience.
This class was amazing!! It's literally a bird course! I went to 1 lecture and I finished with a 95% Its amazing !! DO IT!!!

It was hard to pay attention in this class especially since it is a 2 hour lecture at night. He had a British accent which was pretty cool but he is very monotoned, goes over the material quite quickly and the slides can be confusing at times. The information was actually interesting if you were able to pay attention or by simply reading the text

I had him for Logic and Enlightenment philosophy. He can be difficult to pay attention to, but he explains this very clearly. He also marks fairly and gives great feedback. Speaking to him after class, he also seems like a good & extremely intelligent guy.  He's also happy to give help and advice, so long as you put some effort into his class.
I was afraid of taking this course after reading all the comments, but it really wasn't so bad. He's a pretty decent prof.

The Professor and his textbook were both useless (not surprising as he wrote the text. He said he would do no midterms as to not stress students (if you get sick and do bad on one), but he had a 50% final (yeah not stressful at all). He also used his own website instead of the prescribed standard one (his website wasn't helpfull at all) Horrible

In philosophy 2B03, he does not explain things clearly, makes many mistakes, goes too fast (we're ahead of schedule) and the textbook is not useful since he was the one who wrote it. Since his lectures were not helpful, his book is not either. Grammar and clarity is an issue.
I dont think I have ever had a cooler prof! His use of monty python is excellent and his humor is hilarious. And he does awesome impressions! I want to be a philosopher because of this man.
fantastic
good guy
three words: sexy english accent... im going through that 'i love intellectuals' phase

the accent is cool, but the lectures aren't really that helpful. and i hate having it in the evening. he also doesn't tend to answer questions very well seeing as he doesn't let you finish talking. but if you did the reading, don't bother going.
Great teacher, explains things very well
Explains things VERY clearly, in a monotone, facilitating sleep quite well but so that you understand it inside out (if you can stay awake to hear it).
Sleeping is sooo easy in this class and having it in the evening doens't help. When I get out I;m ready for bed. The accent is entertaining though ;)
very sexy, i love the english accent
-puts overheads on web -reads overheads mostly -voice encourages naps -very nice guy, quirky -easy marks due to TA?
knows his stuff. teaching ability not that great, accent puts you to sleep.
course is pretty easy. he puts all his notes on the web so you don't have to go to class.  His speech is monotonous and puts you to sleep.
he's english accent is soothing and makes me sleepy, he needs to get to the point, although is tries..
Material boring, not very informative, easy to fall asleep in lecture! This guy NEVER stands still!!
grrrrrrr
really knows his stuff and has an excellent way of explaining things.

comments: Good class.
I switched to his 10:30 class and was amazed at how he was able to hold our attention through some boring chapters. His passion shows in his teaching.

Absolute best prof I've had yet. Extremely down to earth and accommodating. Very easy to understand & gives lots of examples. Best decision I made was switching into his 8:30 class. Goes above and beyond his job description and really cares about the success of his students. Also gives lots of hints about what content is most important for exams.
richard deaves should learn a thing or two or three or four or five or six or seven or eight fro this guy
Mr. Juma is awrsome
1AA3 was tolerable because of Aadil. His 8:30am class had over 100 students. That should say something...I suggest taking the course with him if you can
Prof Juma was my favourite prof this semester. I really enjoyed his classes and his respect for his students.

The course is designed with lots of focus on the lecture slides as well as various info from the textbook. I liked accounting and he taught the course well so I was very happy with having him as an instructor from profession even though there was professor with academic qualification.
Hes responsive to emails immediately and patient with questions.
i like him

AMJ is a great prof. He made the commute from Toronto worthwhile. The classes were enjoyable, but a little long. Sometimes, he used the full 3 hours which is tiring after a long day at work but he always kept our attention.
He presents the course material in an interesting approach. Loved the industry examples. I wish all teachers were as passionate about the material they teach.
Mr. Juma is a really nice prof. He looks intimidating but is a great person when you talk to him. Very compassionate.
This guy helped me so much and I am not even a student of his anymore. I took Accounting with him in 2015 and this guy spent an hour teaching me content. Respect!
AMAZING, AMAZING, AMAZING. The best prof. i have ever met. Like his class so much. Replied every e-mail I have sent.
Great teacher and examples given throughout lectures are very helpful. Take him because the other profs aren't better than him.

One of the best profs I've had.. Pre chilled guy and even though attendance is not mandatory if you attend his class and do the work given in class you would get an easy A without doing any work outside his class...

He is the best prof I had at mac. gives you a lot of real examples in the real business world. I hate classes that are only based on theory and I can not relate them to a real situation.  I learned a lot about my future business either in accounting or any other field of management and commerce.
The summarized notes (transcripts as he calls them) are the best I have ever seen. All profs should produce these.

The professor was excellent. I liked how he would interact casually even in an online class. I liked having lots of practice questions available to us. The lectres were helpful in learning key concepts because he would related what we were learning to real life examples. He was also quite funny at times.
AMJ is one of my best profs in BTech. I just wish this class was not online. It was smart to bring him in midway.
Good teaching

Definitely my favourite prof from first year. Very knowledgable and his lectures were really helpful for clarifying concepts from the textbook. He is very approachable and  always made sure we were understanding what he was talking about. You can tell he really cares about his students' success. Would definitely take his class again.
I can only thank god that he took over this course midway and saved it. I almost dropped it if he hadn't taken it over.

Real world examples were helpful in understanding the material. Approachable professor and explains course content well. Class time is used effectively and I felt like I learned so much from him. He is quite funny too.

Definitely the best course that I have taken. He is passionate about the material and cares about our success. He is approachable and encourages us to talk to him. He encourages us to understand the material and directs us to sources to get a deeper understanding. I hope to see him teach some of my future courses.
Just finished writing the exam. Thanks for a great semester. Hope to take more courses with you in the future
Nice classes but hardest exams ever!
Great guy

The best MBA prof hands down! Good examples in class. Used them to relate to content. Very precise about concepts. This is a new course and very well designed and laid out. Attendance was great even though there weren't participation marks!
THE GOAT
Favourite prof I've had so far
Join his section if you get a chance. Explains concepts really well. A bit corny at times. Very hard quizzes.
I miss him in accounting. iw ish he were teaching the managerial class too
Aadil makes me excited for a 3 hour Wednesday night lecture. He made me in-hate accounting and made things so clear. 6/5 if I could, Best prof at McMaster.

Oh man I am graduating from McMaster (my final semester of Commerce) and I realize how much this prof was the greatest prof I had. I had him for half of 2AA3 and 2AB3 back in Fall 2013 and Winter 2016. I feel like going into one of hias 1AA3 lectures this term to relive it. Hands down best prof I had in Commerce, clear concise and I respect him

He is funny and caring towards his students. He can be very strict with troublemakers and distractors and yet be able to joke and refer to his students with lots of respect. Also responds to emails at all times. I like his dedication towards us.
Great professor, very charismatic and makes accounting entertaining. Very concise in his lectures and helps the class with what they struggle with.
Aadil makes me want to get up in the morning.
Do whatever you can to get into Aadil's class.  He is amazing.

I hate accounting in general but with prof aadil he really made me enjoy his class because his lectures were clear and they got to the point. He was always there if you needed help. One of my favourite professors!

I have never had him as my prof but I did work for him as a ta and he is nice to work for. Patient and mentoring and very flexible even though when he hired me it didn't seem so at first. Great guy to get to know. He can write strong reference letters as well.
Was a great professor. He is the reason I am going to choose Accounting. Always speaks about being ethical and moral too.
Awesome Prof. Always willing to chat and help.
I was late for my exam due to the weather and he was so courteous, comforting, and reassuring. Really a gem of a person.
Enjoyed his classes.

I found Mr. Juma was always encouraging. He pushed his students to go that extra step. Many times he said something was not required for the course or exam but he still wanted students to know about it. This extra step really encouraged me to keep coming to classes.
Good prof, really cared about his students and was really accessible outside of class.
Hands down one of the best professors and well respected person at McMaster. Lectures are always clear, thorough, and engaging. He makes learning content interesting and easy.
This course was awesome. best instructor I have had
Great lecturer and inspiring person in general. He is a true 'asset' to McMaster University!
Great prof, made accounting bearable for me. Lectures were very well taught and he is very entertaining and really cares about his students. Definitely take a course with  him if you can!
He is an amazing prof, extremely funny and equally smart. Gives great explanations during his lectures, though attendance is not mandatory I would highly recommend you attend!
Extremely tough course and equally great prof! There's lots of reading from the text. Go to classes and take notes that he writes on the screen. Practice past posted exams.
Amazing prof. Funny, caring and bright.

I found the second half of the course more interesting. The first part on statements was pretty intense for four weeks. I liked variance the most from last class. I had a bad feeling about this course going in but the prof quickly changed my mind after the first class.

I really liked the professor and class the most. The only downside was that sometimes the professor would engage with students who asked d umb questions such as not understanding grading schemes and mark breakdown or questions that had been just answered. This wasted time for other students. The prof. should dismiss such silly questions.

Met with me weekly and prepared a study plan for me. Followed through with me and made sure I was keeping up. I have failed this course before and would fail it again if it was not for his dedication to the lesson plan.
Great prof but I don't get why we need to learn accounting. This prof would be better placed teaching technical courses. He has an Engineering background. He is wasting his skills on accounting.
my favorite prof
Hard course but entertaining instructor. Very approachable outside class. Maintains high standards in the class. I like how he discusses actual news stories and links different accounting courses
Fantastic teacher. Fantastic attitude. Enjoyed the experience of taking the class. He is very patient and very passionate about the subject.
We should have more lc sessions to help us boost our low midterm grades. I'm really fearing the final.
Cool and handsome. I come to class just to hear you speak.
good course structure. keep doing what you do. need a better text book. this one was a waste of money.
great prof.
To do well, just come to all the classes. He does some good exam practice in each class. Midterm is a bit heavy for just few chapters.
He's much better than most GenTech profs. Had him for engineering economics. Would highly recommend him for GenTech courses
I hate the online format for this content but the prof is awesome. He is well prepared for each class and organized. But he faced lots of technical difficulties (although probably not his fault).
I really don't like accounting. I don't know how I would pass if I didn't go to his classes.

Frankly I didn't like the blender format at all. I think I learnt more from this prof than trying to learn it myself. I didn't miss a single class and loved how he explained the concepts. He's also very nice outside the classroom.
Loved doing the case. I hope I get a good grade. This prof makes a boring course very animated and interesting.
Genuinely the best prof I've ever had.

I liked the in class exercises during the two hours section. The pace of the course was a bit too fast. Would love to have you as a prof. in a future course. The course is hard but useful. Experiences shared with class very resourceful. Also allows us some control over grade weighting thus respecting our time.

Juma is caring and effective instructor. if it wasn't for this prof, I would have failed the course. The course content is overwhelming and should be broken into two courses. Prof did amazing job making material easy to understand
Extremely knowledgeable and examples reflected real life. Time frame for case study was short. Quizzes biweekly was good. Overall good.
Good way to make students learn. Smart instructor.
Funny guy....I wish the classes were face2face than online. I really don't feel the subject matter is suitable for online classes. You are still my favorite prof so far in the prog. :)

He spoke about the learning portfolio in class and he said that sometimes students dont give enough credit for stuff they do. It was so true and it was so encouraging to hear examples of stuff students do and they dont document it anywhere and how the learning portfolio can help to do so. He was so encouraging in class.

incorporates real life examples teaching the course. straight forward and too the point. enthusiasm kept me engaged even through the boring chapters. calls students sir and madam when referring to them. so much respect! and generally a nice guy who is not judgemental. also respects women in the class.
one of the best professors ever. so glad to have had him.

Best prof I've had so far.  He is a funny personable guy who also knows what he is talking about.  He encourages that you take it easy every one in a while ans stop worrying about school.  Aadil is awesome!

Good sense of humour, very informative and is not personally difficult. He knows what he's talking about, very cocky( but very funny about it). Replies to your emails in less than 10 minutes and gives you a personal grade on your tests at any point in the day (emailed me at 9pm).
Great taking DCP course with you. One of my best courses and you're my favourite prof. Thanks for keeping in touch.

The best prof Ive had at Mac so far. He respects his students and is very approachable. He does many examples in lecture and explains different ways to solve the problem, catering to different learning styles. If you go to lecture he'll give you hints about what will be on the midterms and exam. The lectures are amazing.
His exam was tough but fair. His review session was very fair. And he was respectful to all his students and warned us of the nature of the difficult chapters on the final.
I have to agree with the comments. This guy is well prepared for each class. He also knows students who participate by their name in a class of 900. That's just awesome sir (:

Hands down the best professor I've ever had.  Knows exactly what hes doing.  Its not the easiest class, but he pushes you to do well and gives you all the resources you'll need to get a 12.  He's outright said attending class isn't necessary to do well, but he's such a great teacher you'll want to go to every single one.
Thanks for teaching us this semester. I never missed a single class. You taught it really well. I just gave you an awesome evaluation.
Love him

I visited him last week due to my low grade. He was compassionate and kind. Discussed some useful time management techniques and encouraged me to improve my grades. Gave me almost 45 minutes of his busy time.

Aadil challenged us in the exams but they were fair. Try to go little slower in class. You seemed well prepared with the material. The TA's were helpful too. I like how you went slowly with class problems. I came to your office hours for help and you were very nice to me. THANK YOU for that.

He has great communication skills, technical skills, and great attitude. He is technically sound and very helpful. His experience in industry makes for good relationship between the content and the examples.

The explanation was easy to understand. Very well prepared & knowledgeable. Takes time to do questions each week in class to help us practice. Eager to help students out. Talks too fast sometimes. Patient and respectful towards students.
JUST BE GRACEFUL IF U HAVE HIM. The best professor u can get in Mac. Too bad he only teaches 2  courses in commerce.
amazing prof, i actually look forward to going to his lectures every week

Your test 1 was very fair. The questions on the written part were very similar to tutorial problems like you promised. Thanks for posting such detailed statistics on our performance. I didn't do as well but that was my fault because I could not study enough. I love your lectures :))

Yes, Juma is an amazing prof but he does things in 2AB3 that really upset me. sir you were an amazing prof but intimidated alot of students by saying 40% of the class will finish with a D Yes your tutorials are good but you make your tests MUCH harder. you're short answer question for midterm 1 Q2 extrmlly unfair. You say 50% avg for it chng Q thn
He is clearly very passionate about the class. Solid lectures and tons of tips on how to solve exam questions. Great prof!

Aadil is the man. Would strongly recommend. Nothing comes easy in this class however he is an outstanding lecturer and is very realistic with you. I have never seen a professor so well respected by all of his students regardless of how well they are doing.

He was a great prof who geniunly wants you to do well. Go to lectures and he will literally spoon feed you exam hints ... don't go to class and miss out on them all. Overall, he gives excellent explanations and is beyond helpful. As a student who was discouraged by accounting, he definitely gave me confidence. Loved his teaching style!
Really good prof. Went through course material in detail and gave plenty of help leading up to the final exam. 10/10 would recommend
I really enjoyed your class. Your final exam was tough but you prepared us well for it. Nothing unexpected. Hope to have you as my professor in the future.
I really enjoyed attending your classes. I never thought anyone can make accounting interesting. You changed my view!

This is my first semester at McMaster in DCP and I enjoyed this course the most. A lot of applications in the real world. Engineering specific examples would be awesome. Aadil is a great teacher. He treated all his students with respect and patience.
We just wrote the exam yesterday and the marks are out today! He is a work horse. Thank you for an amazing semester.

He remembered most of our names and called us by name. His teaching skills were great. Just had his exam and was very fair. Both him and his TA were always available when I emailed for assistance. I even got replies back within 10 minutes when I emailed at 2am!!!
Thanks for all the advice during class. Fun course. Very useful. A lot of useful knowledge of industry. Thanks for not having us buy a textbook!
Just wrote your final exam. Slightly tough but enjoyed the class very much. I hope to have you teach me again in the future! Have a nice summer.

He is a great prof but the exams are tough. You either do well or you don't. He stresses class attendance because he knows you will fail if you do not attend. I think the exams are fair for those who attend class. I did alright on the course but because I missed a couple of classes that hurt my mark. He give lots of tips in classes.

Best Prof I have had so far at Mac.  I wish he was a full-time professor in the business department :(   If only I took 1AA3 with him, too.... ughh! His lectures are amazing and I really like it that he forbids us from using cellphones in class, haha :) It does indeed help us keep focused. I never fell asleep in his classes because he makes it fun
the best prof at mac in my opinion, really wants you to learn and cares about you.
This course is so tough but you try so hard to make it fun and interesting. Thank you for trying so hard and making it interesting.

Thanks. Attending your classes made this course very interesting for me. I was going to pursue marketing but I think I want to change to accounting after taking this course with you. Thank you for shaping my career path :)

I am so glad I am taking this course with him. I failed with the previous professor not because accounting is hard but because it wasnt explained well. With Adil he explains it well and is fair in testing.

I went to him for help in all his office hours and he patiently calmly explain the material to me without ever losing his patience or making me feel dumb. He is really passionate about teaching and ensuring that his students learn.
He's good! Knows his stuff. Strict but respectful to students. He remembered all our names in C02. Knowledgeable yet humble!
He is passionate and enthusiastic about the material. Accounting is boring but he is the reason I go to class. I like the no cell phone discipline as well!
Thank you sir. I enjoyed your class and enjoyed your practical experiences that you shared with us. Best of luck!
Thank you sir. I enjoyed your course and even though it was such challenging material you went out of your way to help us succeed in every way possible. Thank you!!!!
very organized prof. such a good attitude and caring. He cares so much for his students. wants us to do well.
I really enjoyed your classes. Looking forward to seeing you again in Fall!
Hi sir. Thank you for the best semester!!! :)))
Best prof in the courses I have taken.

Took one 3-hour class with him. He left a good impression. He knew his stuff well, cared that the class was following him and the examples. Entertained student questions respectfully and thoroughly. Too bad I have to drop this course for personal reasons but would definitely look for more courses with him.
I attended his classes because I enjoyed them. He made the material interesting and relevant to my daily life. Examples were easy to relate to.
always willing to help. very accommodating and also professional. knows his stuff

One of the best professors at McMaster. Very helpful and clear with the course content. Attending lectures are highly recommended because he does many practice questions in class. He made Accounting a very enjoyable class.
Best prof! Loved his classes. Still attend them even though I am done with the course.
Helpful and knowledgeable professor. Kind during office hours and very professional. Passionate about teaching the material but we have to study hard as well!

One of the best profs in the department. I cannot emphasize the importance of going to his classes. He always gives hints in class. Always crystal clear of expectations and has fair tests. He is very helpful in his office hours. He actually made accounting exciting for me. Awesome professor!
he is one the the best prof in MAC and i really like his teaching style. Office hour is really helpful and textbook is useless, for his class we dont need to buy textbook

One of the best profs I've had at Mac.  Didn't know about anything about accounting before and ended up loving it because of how clear his lectures are.  Honestly just go to class and do the questions he gives you and you'll do good.

If you go to class you will do well.He gave so many hints for the tests in this course. I did find the M/C questions kind of difficult so I recommend doing all of the previous practice tests/exams. Dont even touch the textbook or do textbook questions,it will make you unfocused. Just completely study lectures and all materials posted on avenue.

I know some people did really well in this class, or people did really poorly. There wasn't really an in-between. I found this class extremely difficult and so many people failed the ridiculously hard midterms. The prof needs to realize that this is an introductory accounting course...

comments: An incredible woman who presents interesting material clearly, facilitates thoughtful discussion, and genuinely cares about her students' success and well-being. - one of the best profs I've had at mac - has cool hair :P
Great class. My favourite professor at Mac.
Very good prof! Really enthusiastic about sociology  and loves teaching. Love the fact that she puts up podcasts :) I would recommend taking this class!

Shes a funny and very enthusiastic teacher, but I find her lectures somewhat boring and dry. She rarely ever talks about anything that would be in the exam. All she every talks about is statistics... which I could find out myself.
I love Dr.Fetner she is an amazing prof, very helpful, always happy to be there and her lectures were never boring!

she is awesome! she is really fun in her lectures and has a lot of enthusiasm in her voice that help keep you listening even if the class is at 830am. She is very helpful when answering questions especially email. i saw her at the beach once and said hi, she is super friendly!
She effectively taught the material and was really interesting. I personally, enjoyed going to her lectures, she was always upbeat, and funny. Her assignments weren't hard and graded fairly.
One of my favourite professors every. Very entertaining and easy to follow lectures. Assignments very clear and graded fairly.
She's excellent! Such a nice person, plus late in the course I had a really severe injury and she was very sympathetic and also allowed me to have as long as I'd like with an assignment!
Fetner is anything but unorganized. Her lectures were amazing. If you went to lecture and wrote everything down, 1A06 should be an easy A.

i enjoyed her class. i foundher lectures very interesting. didn't have much control of the class, which was unfortunate for those of us that enjoyed the class. An improvement would be less American content.
Good teacher, very funny.

Awesome prof. Used iclickers which helped keep u interested (and if u go to class anwyays, allowed ypou to get marks for doing so). 2 exams thru the full year course, both very fair. I plan on taking more courses with her in the future.
pretty decent, but has NO control over the class...
Fun fun fun, makes morning lectures perky despite the chilly 8:30am days. Always a good class (whenever I woke up in time to get there)
Prof. fetner is a a great prof.! She engages students and her lectures are always fun. She has a squeaky little voice, but even she admits it's funny! I love this class!
Dr. fetner is pretty funny...but she can be a little hardcore sometimes
Keeps the class interesting

Dr. Fetner is definitely my favourite prof thus far.  I found her to be exceedingly fair and approachable. She answers questions and remarks things with enthusiasm.  Even though it was an 8:30 class I really didn't mind going to it because I found her lectures to be so interesting and light.

She was an awesome prof! Her points were fabulous, her lectures made alot of sense, and she has a great background in the field. YOu can tell she is very dedicated and I hope I can be as articualte at arguing my pojnts in the future. I have no idea about her playing favorites. She just needs to tell certian people to talk LESS in the class.*ahem*
Tangents is the most effective way of describing this prof.  She doesn't stay on topic, and gets distracted very easily.  Midterm and exams aren't difficult if prepared.  Do readings!
Dr. Fetner is a fabulous professor that gives very practical assignments that prepare you for the real world.  And she's quirky and makes the class fun.
She is an excellent prof, but does seem to play favorites.
Tina REALLY likes to play favorites!  You wouldnt believe how much even if I told you.
No Comments
she dyes her hair different colors every class
